name: Slay Station
description:
ENSURE YOU CLICK THE FULL SCREEN ICON

CRASH! The gremlins have taken the ingredients for your alchemical recipes!
A rythm-alchemy (Rythmecy) game about creating little spoopy friends through the dark arts of alchemy! Beat gremlins to death to the music to retrieve the stolen ingredients. But be careful! If you miss a beat, your Cucurbits (Alchemy aparatus) will become damaged, and can only be healed with a c-c-c-c-combo. 

Help/Tips:
You can use any button to hit beats, but since you'll be moving and tracking things with your mouse, we have found that for most people it's easiest if you use one of the mouse buttons.
